metadata.title: FS, Chinese envoy discuss regional cooperation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP):Chinese Special Envoy on Afghan Affairs Ambassador Yue Xiaoyong, called on Foreign Secretary Amna Baloch here on Saturday and discussed matters of mutual interest. The two sides exchanged views on regional cooperation and security challenges. They reaffirmed their commitment to work together to achieve the common goal of regional peace and development.
